values.description: array of numbers OR number indexed dict (use %value% placeholder), null for automatic

icon.description: see MaterialIcons-Regular.codepoints (key or hex code, f.e. E63E)

cells.description: Cell widgets by cell number, use %value% placeholder

headerAlignments.description: control alignments per column (column number: Alignment)

toc.description: Insert as TOC-page on page number

sources.description: resources like image, svg, .. also table data, etc

binary.description: inline data, f.e. for svg, paths ...

url.description: Remote file will get downloaded and cached
